description: suspicious command line to remove exe or dll Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Del in CommandLine
query: ((process.command_line:*del\ *.exe* AND process.command_line:*\/f\ * AND process.command_line:*\/q\ *) OR (process.command_line:*del\ *.dll* AND process.command_line:*C\:\\ProgramData\\*))
